name: riptide
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a dangerous area of strongly moving water in the sea, where two or more currents (= water moving in a particular direction) meet: The riptide was pulling a surfer under.
a strong negative feeling or force that is difficult to control: Warnings about terror attacks sent a riptide of anxiety through the nation.
